Head traumas is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* Head traumas
* HeadTrauma

#### Uses

Head traumas is used by the model in the following places

* as a risk factor for [Brain cancer](/model/BrainCancer)

#### Guidance

The user input is a typed number and should answer the question

> How many concussions have you had that caused hospitilization, memory loss or loss of conscience?

The unit of the input is **Concussions**.

The answer has to be larger than 0 Concussions.

### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Head traumas is [2](/model/optimizabilities#category-2). This means that it can be interpreted as



> *It is impossible to change, but it could have been the consequence of your actions*
